name: ChocolatePlatform-Mediation-AdColony

license.text: You must accept the terms and conditions on the AdColony website by registering in order to legally use the AdColony SDK. U.S. based companies will need to complete the W-9 form and send it to us, as well as complete the section on payment information on clients.adcolony.com, before publisher payments can be issued.

summary: Copy of AdColony iOS SDK version 2.6.2
